A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall pretty good. The whole movie was too busy for me though. I don't mind some action scenes but it had way too many for my liking. I felt it had two major mistakes\, which I won't state because they are spoilers. One is bad enough that I will not bother watching the next one- not out of spite\, but because I have now lost interest. The biggest reason I liked Star Wars to Begin with is no longer a part of the series. I think many will feel the same.
